divs: sighting detailsi went to tucson arizona to visit my brother for two weeks.as for the aproximate dates.i will have to find it in my emails somewhere and get back with you on that. im going to say it was about 10pm\or after.i went outside to smoke a cigarette before going to bed.i sat down and it was very nice weather.no clouds in the sky,the moon and stars were out.it was a very clear night.and i sat looking out toward the mountains.after a good ten minutes or so.i noticed lights coming toward me.i thought it was a plane.and it was coming directly toward me.i thought at least i got something to look at. the plane gonna pass right over me.as i was watching it.it was coming toward me.so i was just looking around at other things and id look back at the lights.several minutes went by.and then i thought.that plane should of had reached me already.as it got closer.i noticed it was in a large -v- shape.and it was moving very slowely.i then knew that it could not be a plane.as it got closer i noticed that it was huge.the white lights along the sides were steady.and it was just gliding very slowely.my god i thought it cant be a plane.the plane should of went over me along time ago.thats what made me notice the object.i was not scared at all.i was more curious then scared.as it got closer it was even bigger than i thought.and very slow.several more minutes went by.it was then getting closer.i then walked to the middle of the yard and i noticed that it was about two football fields in length if not a little smaller.thats the only way i can tell you how large it was.and was just gliding very slowely.as i was looking at it.i also noticed it was very close im gonna try and say how i can only describe it..i have a tree in my yard which is about 75-feet..im gonna say it was about 6-of those trees high up in the air..thats the only way i can describe it.it was very close.i then tryed to hear any kind of sound or motor running.and i heard none at all.it was complete silence.as it was about to go right directly over me.i moved right to the middle of the yard.and it went right directly over me.no sound at all.and just gliding right over me.i watched it go over me.and it kept gliding straight ahead and just watched it go pass and pass the other side of the mountains and it was gone.scared no i was not scared at all.very curious.and to this day i am still wondering what it was.
Summary: large -V- shape.steady lights running down each side all white
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
